law.catch_line: Compensation of members of board of adjustment.
law.text: The members of the board of adjustment shall receive compensation for their services at the rate of five dollars ($5) per day for time spent on the work of the board of adjustment, in addition to expenses necessarily incurred in the discharge of their duties. The district board shall pay the necessary administrative and other expenses of operation incurred by the board of adjustment upon the certificate of the chairman of the board of adjustment.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 42i-12.
